strategy: Baran Siegemaster armies have a Strategy Rating of 1.
Initiative: All formations have a Initiative Rating of 2+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Baran Siegemasters

sections.name: Core Company Formations
sections.description: One Siegemaster Regimental HQ must be taken.

formations.name: 1 Siegemaster Regimental HQ
formations.units: One Baran Siegemaster with a Commissar, nine Siege Infantry, 40cm Trenches, 40cm Razor Wire

formations.name: Siege Infantry Company
formations.units: One Baran Commander with a Commissar, nine Siege Infantry, 40cm Trenches, 40cm Razor Wire

formations.name: Heavy Tank Company
formations.units: One Commissar, six Ragnarok Heavy Tanks

sections.name: Baran Support Formations
sections.description: Up to two Support Formations for each Core Company.

formations.name: Macharius Company
formations.units: One Macharius Command with a Commissar, two Macharius

formations.name: Sapper Company
formations.units: One Commissar, eight Sappers, one Hades Breaching Drill

formations.name: Siege Artillery Emplacement
formations.units: Three Bombards and three Gun Emplacements or four Medusa Guns and four Gun Emplacements

formations.name: Howitzer Emplacement
extraUnits: Add three Howitzers and three Gun Emplacements: 125 points
Add one Heavy AA Gun and one Gun Emplacement: 50 points

formations.name: Flak Emplacement
formations.units: Three Heavy AA Guns, three Gun Emplacements

sections.name: Imperial Navy Aircraft
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on Imperial Navy formations

upgrades.title: Baran Siegemaster Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation. Max three upgrades per Company

options.description: Add one Deathstrike to the formation

items.name: Support Weapons
items.description: Add any one of the following options to the formation

options.description: Replace 40cm of Trenches and 40cm of Razor Wire with 5 Siege Infantry
Add up to two Bane Wolves
Add three Ragnarok Heavy Tanks, or two Malcadors, or two Malcador Annihilators
